benchmark_details.name: SustainableQA: A Comprehensive Question Answering Dataset for Corporate Sustainability and EU Taxonomy Reporting
benchmark_details.overview: SustainableQA is a novel dataset and a scalable pipeline for generating a comprehensive QA dataset from corporate sustainability reports and annual reports, addressing the critical need for high-quality training and evaluation data in corporate sustainability and EU Taxonomy reporting.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive QA dataset that enhances model performance in navigating corporate sustainability compliance data.

data.source: 61 corporate reports from German and Austrian companies featuring dedicated sections on EU Taxonomy and ESG.
data.annotation: Hybrid span extraction pipeline combining fine-tuned Named Entity Recognition, rule-based methods, and LLM-driven refinement.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using standard evaluation methods for question answering.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance in extracting relevant information from sustainability reports.
methodology.validation: Dataset validated using multiple prompting strategies across state-of-the-art language models.
